foreignData.name: Felsenburg-Aufpasser
foreignData.text:
FliegendIrrealität (Diese Kreatur kann nur Kreaturen mit Irrealität blocken und nur von solchen geblockt werden.)
{B}{B}: Kreaturen mit Irrealität erhalten +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges und Kreaturen ohne Irrealität erhalten -1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.text:

{B}{B}: Las criaturas con la habilidad de desvanecerse obtienen +1/+0 hasta el final del turno y las criaturas sin la habilidad de desvanecerse obtienen -1/-0 hasta el final del turno.

name: Stronghold Overseer
originalText:
Flying
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{B}{B}: Creatures with shadow get +1/+0 until end of turn and creatures without shadow get -1/-0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Once a creature has been blocked, that creature remains blocked and will deal and be dealt combat damage even if it gains or loses shadow or if the blocking creature gains or loses shadow.
If an attacking creature has multiple evasion abilities, such as shadow and flying, a creature can block it only if that creature satisfies all of the appropriate evasion abilities.
Multiple instances of shadow on the same creature are redundant.
